starvationevasion.common.policies

Class GMOSeedInsectResistanceResearchPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.common.PolicyCard
      • starvationevasion.common.policies.GMOSeedInsectResistanceResearchPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GMOSeedInsectResistanceResearchPolicy
extends PolicyCard
implements java.io.Serializable
    Title: "GMO Seed Insect Resistance Research"

    Game Text: "Each participating region spends X million dollars to fund GMO seed research for increasing insect resistance of target crop."

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects a crop and an amount X to be paid by EACH player who approves the policy.

    Votes Required: 1

    Model Effects: 5% bonus to effectiveness of total dollars spent per participating region.

    Starting 10 years after research, permanent reduction in kg/km2 of pesticides for target crop. All player and non-player regions in world who permit GMO in their region receive this benefit.
    Benefit yield is an ease-in-out cubic bezier function of effective dollars spent and target crop.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • votesRequired

        public int votesRequired()
        In the abstract Policy class, this method returns the default behavior of a policy card (votesRequired() = 0). If a class extending Policy is not automatic, then it must override this method.
        Overrides:
        votesRequired in class PolicyCard
        Returns:
        0 if the policy is automatic. Otherwise, returns the number of votes required for the policy to be enacted.
        Note: This will always return a number that is no smaller than the number of regions returned by getRegionsEligibleToVote().

      • voteWaitForAll

        public boolean voteWaitForAll()
        In the abstract Policy class, this method returns the default behavior of a policy card (voteWaitForAll() = false). If a class extending Policy is not automatic and requires waiting, then it must override this method.
        Overrides:
        voteWaitForAll in class PolicyCard
        Returns:
        true if voting should continue until all eligible players have voted on this policy. Return false if voting should stop as soon as the required number of votes have been reached.
